public class Tree
extends Flora

Constructor Detail

Tree

public Tree(EvolutionWorld world)
The first tree, with default values

Parameters:
EvolutionWorld - world The EvolutionWorld into which the tree has been spawned

Tree

public Tree(Tree parent,
            boolean living)
Constructor for a tree with a parent; mutates values of the parent

Parameters:
Tree - parent A Tree object reference to the parent tree
boolean - living Whether the tree is living, or just a duplicate kept as a reference in a fruit
Method Detail

act

public void act()
If the tree is a living tree (and not a fruit reference replica), the tree will absorb nutrients and grow, or if it cannot absorb nutrients, move towards death. During normal growth, the counters of the tree all increase.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

getFoodProvidedPerTurn

public double getFoodProvidedPerTurn()
Returns:
double The food provided by a fruit produced by this tree, per turn

Returns:
int the time it takes for a fruit to grow in turns

double The amount of nutrition currently stored in the tree

Returns:
int The radius within which the tree's fruit can spawn alone

public double getRotRate()
Returns:
double The rate at which fruit rot

getTreeGrowTime

public int getTreeGrowTime()
Returns:
int The number of turns that it takes for the tree to grow up one stage

Returns:
